## Rock Types
| Type | Formation | Examples |
|------|-----------|----------|
| Igneous | Cooling magma | Granite, basalt |
| Sedimentary | Compacted sediments | Sandstone, limestone |
| Metamorphic | Heat/pressure | Marble, slate |
